ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Lag at the Bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: I just want people to come back to the EC tunnel......lol I am on Druzzil and let me tell you, it is like someone dropped mega NUKES in there. I think I saw
ygData.messageBody:
I just want people to come back to the EC
tunnel......lol


I am on Druzzil and let me tell you, it is like
someone dropped mega NUKES in there.

I think I saw like 20 people in there over the
weekend.

Later

--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> I don't think anyone has said this was Verant's
> fault. I think we all
> realize that anytime you have a large number of
> people someplace it is going
> to zone. It is kindof amazing to realize that there
> are 200+ people in one
> zone though. I don't think people expected to see
> that many in one zone.
> Hopefully the lag will die down some as the novelty
> of the new features
> start to fade. Who knows though, maybe they might
> have to make a bazaar2.
> Until then, some of us with really pathetic 'net
> connections will have to
> wait until the fervor dies down.
> And nah. You're not going to get flamed. You're just
> stating the facts. :-)
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Hi everyone,
> > Well I'm probably going to get flamed for this but
> you all do
> > realize that the bazaar is a new feature and it's
> going to get hammered
> > by practically all the players in the first couple
> of weeks? If any
> > Verant admins monitor this list maybe they could
> post the stats on how
> > many hits the servers for the bazaar are getting
> and their processing
> > percentage plus the net traffic stats. I bet that
> they will all
> > practically be maxed out. Basically what I'm
> saying is, yes the lag is
> > annoying but be patient and give it time and it
> will quickly even itself
> > out. The problem is not your computer, it's a
> combination of your
> > connection to the net and how many are also on at
> your local hub at the
> > same time you are, (if you have a broadband
> connection), and that the
> > servers are taking a hellacious beating right now.
> The bank in Kelethin
> > is this way, it lags when everyone is meeting
> there but when everyone is
> > out hackin and slashin it's really smooth.
> >
> > Happy Hunting!
> > Steve
> >
>
>
>
